name: Query Rapid ILS Electronic Monos
query: SELECT DISTINCT Split_part(identifiers.identifier, ' ', 1) AS isbn, instances.title AS title, holdings.permanent_location_name AS location,holdings.call_number AS call_number, pub.date_of_publication AS pub_date FROM folio_derived.instance_identifiers identifiers INNER JOIN folio_derived.instance_ext instances ON identifiers.instance_id = instances.instance_id INNER JOIN folio_derived.holdings_ext holdings ON instances.instance_id = holdings.instance_id INNER JOIN folio_derived.instance_publication pub ON instances.instance_id = pub.instance_id WHERE identifiers.identifier_type_name = 'ISBN' AND instances.mode_of_issuance_name IN ('single unit', 'multipart monograph') AND instances.type_name = 'text' AND instances.discovery_suppress ::boolean = FALSE AND holdings.discovery_suppress ::boolean = FALSE AND holdings.permanent_location_name IN ( 'www_evans', 'WWW MSL Subscription', 'WWWmslsub', 'WWW Bulk Load', 'WWWbulk', 'WWW MSL Ebooks', 'WWWebooks', 'WWW MSL Database', 'WWWdb', 'www_msl') ORDER BY isbn, title, location, call_number
